prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is suitable for complex LLM-based applications, separating code from prompts, and orchestrating multiple prompts, but may not be ideal for simple single-prompt implementations or non-JavaScript/TypeScript environments.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
